Cloak of the Avatar.name: Cloak of the Avatar

Magic Shell.name: Magic Shell
Magic Shell.passive:
Using this item applies a shield to yourself and allies within 35 units for 100 Health + 12 Health per God Level for 3 seconds. Additionally, all allies take 20% reduced damage from Basic Attacks while the shield is active. Cooldown - 150s.
<font color='#f59b56'>Kill or assist minions to upgrade this Relic for free.

Greater Magic Shell.name: Greater Magic Shell
Greater Magic Shell.passive:
Using this item applies a shield to yourself and allies within 35 units for 100 Health + 12 Health per God Level for 3 seconds. Additionally, all allies take 20% reduced damage from Basic Attacks while the shield is active. Cooldown - 130s.
<font color='#f59b56'>Deal instances of damage or Crowd Control to enemy Gods to upgrade this Relic for free. You may only gain one stack per second.

Phantom Shell.name: Phantom Shell
Phantom Shell.passive: Using this item applies a shield to yourself and allies within 35 units for 150 Health + 15 Health per God Level for 4 seconds. Additionally, all allies take 40% reduced damage from Basic Attacks while the shield is active. Using this item also allows you and allied gods to pass through players and player made objects. Cooldown - 130s.

Scorching Blink Rune.name: Scorching Blink Rune
Scorching Blink Rune.passive: Using this item will allow you to teleport up to 45 units away instantly, leaving behind a trail of wildfire that burns Enemies that pass through it for 20 (+ 4 per level) True Damage every 0.5s for the next 4s. Additionally, enemies hit have their Movement and Attack Speed Slowed by 15%. These effects persist for 1.5s after leaving the flames. This item can not be used if you have taken or dealt damage in the last 3s. Cooldown - 120s.

Sundering Spear.name: Sundering Spear
Sundering Spear.passive:
Fire a bolt that travels 70 units, stopping on first god hit dealing 5% of their Max Health as True Damage and reducing any active shields by 75%. Targets hit take 5% increased damage for 5s. This relic has 2 charges. Cooldown - 130s.
<font color='#f59b56'>Kill or assist minions to upgrade this Relic for free.

Greater Sundering Spear.name: Greater Sundering Spear
Greater Sundering Spear.passive:
Fire a bolt that travels 70 units, stopping on first god hit dealing 5% of their Max Health as True Damage and reducing any active shields by 75%. Targets hit take 5% increased damage for 5s. This relic has 2 charges. Cooldown - 110s.
<font color='#f59b56'>Deal instances of damage or Crowd Control to enemy Gods to upgrade this Relic for free. You may only gain one stack per second.

Sundering Blast.name: Sundering Blast
Sundering Blast.passive: Fire a bolt that travels 70 units, stopping on the first Enemy God hit and splashing in a 20 unit radius, dealing 7.5% of their Max Health as True Damage and reducing any active shields by 75%. Targets hit take 7.5% increased damage for 5s. This relic has 2 charges. Cooldown - 110s.

Persistent Teleport.name: Persistent Teleport
Persistent Teleport.passive: Using this item allows you to teleport to any allied structure or ward while Rooted in place. This effect is not interrupted by damage but is interrupted by hard Crowd Control. Kills and assists on enemy gods reduces the cooldown by 10s. After teleporting you gain Slow immunity, 20% Movement Speed, and 40 Protections for 5s. Cooldown - 110s.

Cloak of Meditation.name: Cloak of Meditation
Cloak of Meditation.passive:
Using this item causes you to enter a meditative state where nearby allied gods within 35 units restore 10 + 2.5% of their missing health and 10 + 3% of missing mana each tick. Heals occur once every second for 4s. Cooldown - 150s.
<font color='#f59b56'>Kill or assist minions to upgrade this Relic for free.

Greater Cloak of Meditation.name: Greater Cloak of Meditation
Greater Cloak of Meditation.passive:
Using this item causes you to enter a meditative state where nearby allied gods within 35 units restore 10 + 2.5% of their missing health and 10 + 3% of missing mana each tick. Heals occur once every second for 4s. Cooldown - 130s.
<font color='#f59b56'>Deal instances of damage or Crowd Control to enemy Gods to upgrade this Relic for free. You may only gain one stack per second.

Cloak of the Ascetic.name: Cloak of the Ascetic
Cloak of the Ascetic.passive: Using this item causes you to Enter a meditative state where nearby allied gods within 35 units restore 25 + 3.5% of their missing health and 30 + 4% of missing mana each pulse. Additionally each pulse reduces cooldowns for all abilities by 1.5s. Pulses occur once every second for 4s. Cooldown - 130s.

Aegis of Acceleration.name: Aegis of Acceleration
Aegis of Acceleration.passive: Using this item makes you invulnerable to damage and healing for 1.5s, and prevents you from taking any actions. You may still move. Each instance of damage prevented in this time provides you 7% Movement Speed for 4s, stacking up to 3 times. Cooldown - 140s.

Thorns of Judgement.name: Thorns of Judgement
Thorns of Judgement.passive: Using this item grants you 15% Damage Mitigation as you store all damage taken over the next 3s. You then explode in a 30 unit radius, dealing 85 + 50% of the damage taken as Magical Damage, up to a maximum of 25% of an enemy’s Max Health. While this is active, enemies can only lifesteal from you for 50% of their total lifesteal. Each basic attack from enemy gods reduces the cooldown of this item by 0.5s. Cooldown - 120s.

Rejuvenating Heart.name: Rejuvenating Heart
Rejuvenating Heart.passive: PASSIVE - Lifestealing off of enemy gods heals yourself and nearby allies within 55 units of you by 75% of that healing.

Bancroft's Claw.name: Bancroft's Claw
Bancroft's Claw.passive: PASSIVE - You gain additional Magical Power and Lifesteal scaled from missing Health. This caps at 70 power and 15% Lifesteal at 40% Health. <n>GLYPH - Every 10s gain a stack of Hunger(max 3). Abilities cast within 30 units of enemy gods consume a stack, dealing bonus damage equal to 1% of their max HP for each 75 Magical Power you have. Each god damaged by Hunger provides you with a shield of 1% of your Max HP for each 75 Magical Power you have. This cannot exceed 35% of your Max HP.

Nimble Bancroft's Talon.name: Nimble Bancroft's Talon
Nimble Bancroft's Talon.passive: PASSIVE - You gain additional Magical Power and Lifesteal scaled from missing Health. This caps at 70 power and 15% Lifesteal at 40% Health. <n>GLYPH - For every 30 Magical Power you have, you gain 2 Basic Attack Power and 2% Attack Speed.

Vampiric Shroud.name: Vampiric Shroud
Vampiric Shroud.passive: PASSIVE - Damaging any enemy with an ability restores 2 health and 6 mana. Can only trigger once per target per ability. Can be upgraded at level 20.

Blood-soaked Shroud.name: Blood-soaked Shroud
Blood-soaked Shroud.passive: PASSIVE - Damaging any enemy with an ability restores 1.2% Health and Mana. Can only trigger once per target per ability.

Sacrificial Shroud.name: Sacrificial Shroud
Sacrificial Shroud.passive: PASSIVE - Your abilities deal 15% more damage, but cost 3% of your Maximum Health. If the cost would kill you, you instead don't pay the cost.

Hunter's Cowl.name: Hunter's Cowl
Hunter's Cowl.passive: AURA - While you are within 55 units of an allied god you gain 20% Attack Speed Aura. If you are alone you instead gain 10% Movement Speed.

Leather Cowl.name: Leather Cowl
Leather Cowl.passive: PASSIVE - While you are within 55 units of an allied god you gain 10% Attack Speed. If you are alone you instead gain 5% Movement Speed. Can be upgraded at level 20.

Leader's Cowl.name: Leader's Cowl
Leader's Cowl.passive: AURA - You provide 5% increased Power to all nearby allied gods. This aura gains a bonus stack for each ally god within 55 units causing it to provide an additional 3% increased Power. For each enemy god within 55 units a stack is removed.

Jotunn's Vigor.name: Jotunn's Vigor
Jotunn's Vigor.passive: GLYPH - If you drop beneath 60% health, gain 15% Movement Speed and 30% Physical Ability Lifesteal for 8s. This effect may only occur once every 15s.

Raven Ward.name: Raven Ward
Raven Ward.passive: This is a ward that flies along a 500 unit line that allows you to see enemy movements within 50 units. It does not respect line of sight and can see through stealth. Can only carry one at a time.

Crimson Claws.name: Crimson Claws
Crimson Claws.passive: PASSIVE - Lifestealing from enemies while at full Health grants you the value healed as a Shield, which may not exceed 15% of your Maximum Health.

Divine Barrier.name: Divine Barrier
Divine Barrier.passive:
Deploy a 40 unit wide wall of divine light that reduces the damage of all enemy Basic Attacks that pass through it by 30%. Additionally, all allies that pass through the barrier have their Movement Speed increased by 5% for 3s while enemies that pass through it are Slowed by 30% for 3s. The barrier lasts for 30s. Cooldown - 100s.
<font color='#f59b56'>Kill or assist minions to upgrade this Relic for free.

Greater Divine Barrier.name: Greater Divine Barrier
Greater Divine Barrier.passive:
Deploy a 40 unit wide wall of divine light that reduces the damage of all enemy Basic Attacks that pass through it by 30%. Additionally, all allies that pass through the barrier have their Movement Speed increased by 5% for 3s while enemies that pass through it are Slowed by 30% for 3s. The barrier lasts for 30s. Cooldown - 80s.
<font color='#f59b56'>Deal instances of damage or Crowd Control to enemy Gods to upgrade this Relic for free. You may only gain one stack per second.

Blessed Barrier.name: Blessed Barrier
Blessed Barrier.passive: Deploy a 40 unit wide wall of divine light that reduces the damage of all enemy Basic Attacks that pass through it by 30% and increases the damage of all allied Basic Attacks by 20%. Additionally, all allies that pass through the barrier have their Movement Speed increased by 5% for 3s while enemies that pass through it are Slowed by 30% for 3s. The barrier lasts for 30s. Cooldown - 80s.

Proximity Ward.name: Proximity Ward
Proximity Ward.passive: This is a ward that allows you to see enemy movements within 20 units. It does respect line of sight and can't see through walls or stealth. If an enemy god enters its vision range, the ward will explode after 1.5s in a 45 unit radius, Slowing enemy gods by 20% for 3s and revealing them for 10s. It remains for 5 minutes or until killed. Can only carry one at a time. Unlocks at level 5.

Devoted Deathbringer.name: Devoted Deathbringer
Devoted Deathbringer.passive: PASSIVE - Critical Strike bonus damage dealt is increased by 25%. <n>GLYPH - Your Critical Strike Chance is multiplied by 1.2. For each 5% Critical Strike Chance you go over 100% Critical Strike Chance, you gain 5 Physical Power.

Envenomed Executioner.name: Envenomed Executioner
Envenomed Executioner.passive: PASSIVE - Basic Attacks against an enemy reduce your target's Physical Protection by 7% for 3s (max. 4 stacks). <n>GLYPH - Successfully hitting an Enemy God will afflict them with a stack of poison for 3s (max. 4 stacks). This poison reduces their healing by 10% and Shields applied on them are reduced by 12.5%.

Stormseeker.name: Stormseeker
Stormseeker.passive: PASSIVE - When you hit an enemy god with a Basic Attack, gain a permanent stacking Attack Speed buff. Each stack grants 0.25% Attack Speed for a max of 999 stacks.

Equinox.name: Equinox
Equinox.passive: PASSIVE - When you hit an enemy with a Basic Attack from the front, you heal for 1 + 1 Health per level, which is increased by 50% if the target is a god. When you hit an enemy with a Basic Attack from the back, you deal an additional 15 + 3 Physical damage per level.

Curseweaver.name: Curseweaver
Curseweaver.passive: PASSIVE - Hitting an enemy god with a Basic Attack or Ability marks them for 4s. When the marked enemy god casts an ability, they take 5% of your Maximum Health + 7.5% of your Maximum Mana as Magical damage. You heal for 100% of the damage dealt. You may only apply a mark once every 20s. Each time an enemy casts an ability within 55 units of you, reduce the cooldown of this item by 1s.

Duality.name: Duality
Duality.passive: PASSIVE - Once every 3s, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 25% damage as Physical Ability damage. This damage can trigger ability item effects.

Keen Blade.name: Keen Blade
Keen Blade.passive: PASSIVE - Your Basic Attacks deal an additional 10% of your Basic Attack Power as Physical damage.

Piercing Star.name: Piercing Star
Piercing Star.passive: PASSIVE - Every 5s, your next ability deals 2% of the target’s Maximum Health as Physical damage.

Swift Edge.name: Swift Edge
Swift Edge.passive: PASSIVE - Damaging an enemy god with an ability grants 3% Movement Speed toward them for 3s. Stacks up to 3 times.

Book of Secrets.name: Book of Secrets
Book of Secrets.passive: PASSIVE - Each time you damage an enemy god with an ability, gain a stack. Each stack grants nothing, but when you upgrade this item, these stacks transfer to the upgraded item. You may only gain one stack every 4s, and can only gain stacks once per god per ability hit. Max 50 stacks.

Renewing Talisman.name: Renewing Talisman
Renewing Talisman.passive: PASSIVE - Gain a stack each time you damage or are damaged by an enemy god, once per ability. Upon reaching 5 stacks, lose all stacks and restore 100 Mana in a 40 unit radius around you.

Daimyo’s Kusari.name: Daimyo’s Kusari
Daimyo’s Kusari.passive: PASSIVE - For each enemy god within 55 units of you, reduce all enemy god’s Magical Protections by 4. For each ally within 55 units of you, increase all allied gods’ Attack Speed by 5%.

Steel Crest.name: Steel Crest
Steel Crest.passive: PASSIVE - Each time you are hit by a Basic Attack, gain a stack. You may only gain one stack per second. At 4 stacks, remove all stacks and gain a 75 Health Shield that lasts for 5s or until destroyed.

Hastened Fatalis.name: Hastened Fatalis
Hastened Fatalis.passive: PASSIVE - Hitting an enemy with a Basic Attack grants Haste for 1s, causing you to be immune to the Basic Attack Movement Penalty.

Ichaival.name: Ichaival
Ichaival.passive: PASSIVE - Every successful Basic Attack increases your Physical Power by 5, reduces your target's Physical Power from items by 5, and reduces your target’s Magical Power from items by 10 for 6s. (Max. 4 Stacks)

Stone Cutting Sword.name: Stone Cutting Sword
Stone Cutting Sword.passive: PASSIVE - Melee Basic Attacks decrease enemy Physical Protection by 7, and increase your Physical Protection by 7 for 3s (max. 3 Stacks).

Ring of Hecate.name: Ring of Hecate
Ring of Hecate.passive: PASSIVE - Each successful Basic Attack applies a hex to enemies and empowers you, increasing your Magical Power by 5% and reducing the Physical and Magical Power of your opponent by 5% for 5s. (Max. 3 Stacks).

Ancile.name: Ancile
Ancile.passive: PASSIVE - Whenever you take Magical Damage from an enemy ability you unleash a shockwave that Silences all enemies within a range of 30 units for 1s. This effect cannot trigger more than once every 30s. While this effect is on cooldown, gain 20 Physical Power and 35 Magical Power.

Shield of the Phoenix.name: Shield of the Phoenix
Shield of the Phoenix.passive: PASSIVE - Anytime you hit an Enemy god with an ability you are healed for 2% of your maximum Health and Mana. This can only trigger once per god per ability.

Shifter's Shield.name: Shifter's Shield
Shifter's Shield.passive: PASSIVE - While over 75% Health, you gain 20 Physical Power and 30 Magical Power. While under 75% Health, you gain 20 Protections.

Hide of the Nemean Lion.name: Hide of the Nemean Lion
Hide of the Nemean Lion.passive: PASSIVE - Reflect 15% of all Basic Attack damage back to the attacker as Physical Damage.
